titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation of objects from the R.M.S. Titanic.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 8/3/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the importation of objects from the R.M.S. Titanic for purposes of commercial gain. Terminates the prohibition upon the entry into force of an international agreement to which the United States is a party governing salvage of the R.M.S. Titanic.
